article_title: More elderly having end-of-life talks that once fueled 'death panel' fears

og.description: HACKENSACK, N.J.—The doctor got right down to business after Herbert Diamond bounded in. A single green form before her, she had some questions for the agile 88-year-old: about comas and ventilators, about feeding tubes and CPR, about intense and irreversible suffering.
